articles.author: Ewan Murray
articles.title: Viktor Hovland strolls to Tour Championship to boost Ryder Cup hand - The Guardian
articles.description: What a finish, what a guy,’ said Europe captain Luke Donald as Hovland collected an $18m bonus on lifting the FedEx Cup in Georgia‘
articles.content: The finest fortnight of Viktor Hovlands career has boosted European hopes of reclaiming the Ryder Cup in Rome. On putting performance alone, the 25-year-old must be striking fear into previously bull… [+7799 chars]
